name: 3dWilcoxon
author: AFNI Developers
description: Nonparametric Wilcoxon signed-rank test for paired comparisons of two samples

inputs.description: Data set for X observations. The user must specify 1 and only 1 sub-brick with each -dset command.
inputs.name: Dataset 1 for X observations

inputs.description: Data set for Y observations. The user must specify 1 and only 1 sub-brick with each -dset command.
inputs.name: Dataset 2 for Y observations

inputs.description: Number of megabytes of RAM to use for statistical workspace
inputs.name: Workspace memory in megabytes

inputs.description: Estimated population delta and Wilcoxon signed-rank statistics are written to file
inputs.name: Output file prefix

output-files.description: Estimated population delta and Wilcoxon signed-rank statistics
output-files.name: Output statistics file
